abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Second Tanzania
            Investment Bank Project loan are twofold. First, in line
            with the Government's plan to reduce Tanzania's
            economic dependence by increasing productive investments,
            the loan will provide resources for investment in medium and
            large scale industries, agro-business and tourism. Second,
            the loan will make it possible for the Bank to support TIB
            in further improving its procedures and project selection.
